author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
<@!489256758989029405> I'm unable to build nethermind from source and the docker & last release seem to only have yolov3 not yolov3x.
Do you provide a compiled version of the latest master somewhere that I can use?

content: I think there is the special docker for hive?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Nah I think it's some weird configuration issue.
```
/home/matematik/ethereum/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Runner.Test/Nethermind.Runner.Test.csproj : error NU1201: Project RocksDbNative is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Project RocksDbNative supports: netstandard2.1 (.NETStandard,Version=v2.1) [/home/matematik/ethereum/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.sln]
/home/matematik/ethereum/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Runner.Test/Nethermind.Runner.Test.csproj : error NU1201: Project RocksDbSharp is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Project RocksDbSharp supports: netcoreapp3.1 (.NETCoreApp,Version=v3.1) [/home/matematik/ethereum/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.sln]
```

author: tkstanczak
content: do you have old sources and did not git submodule update?

author: tkstanczak
content: seems like your submodules are in the old version

author: tkstanczak
content: you can update or clone again with --recursive
